data.name: STALCRAFT Demo
data.detailed_description:
STALCRAFT is a combination of MMOFPS and Survival Horror. It features a unique open world, RPG and shooter mechanics, and atmospheric gameplay.

Gameplay

The player spends most of their time in the open world of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. Locations are filled with all sorts of PvP and PvE activities beloved by fans of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: searching for artifacts, hunting mutants, exploring uncharted locations and laboratories, completing quests, and participating in faction wars. For time-poor players, there are various session modes.

Plot and quests

The main storyline introduces the player to the Zone, putting them at the center of an intriguing story full of cutscenes and difficult choices. There are also lots of side quests filled with memorable characters and stalker romance.

First-person shooter

STALCRAFT has a similar weapon balance to games like Call of Duty, where reaction times and shooting skills are paramount. High-quality weapon animations and sounds allow players to enjoy the action to the fullest.

Engine and setting

STALCRAFT was originally conceived as a global fan mod for Minecraft, bringing the world of the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. games online. However, after seven years of intensive development, the project has changed significantly, and is now based on its own game engine. We position the game as an independent product inspired by GSC Game World's games, but not copying them.

PVP in an open world

One of the key features of the game is complete PvP freedom. Players join one of several warring factions and can kill outsiders anywhere, except for small safe zones and quest dungeons. What would a stalker's life be without looting and ambushes?

Distribution model

The game is available on a free-to-play basis for PC. Progress is not tied to donations: everything can be collected through quests, from NPC traders, or from other players at in-game auctions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD Athlon II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 580 / AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-6330
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended
